CustomField.formula: If(LEN(TEXT(DAY(DATEVALUE( CreatedDate )))) = 1 ,'0'+TEXT(DAY(DATEVALUE( CreatedDate )))+'/',TEXT(DAY(DATEVALUE( CreatedDate )))+'/')+ If(LEN(TEXT(MONTH(DATEVALUE( CreatedDate )))) = 1 ,'0'+TEXT(MONTH(DATEVALUE( CreatedDate )))+'/',TEXT(MONTH(DATEVALUE( CreatedDate )))+'/')+ TEXT(YEAR(DATEVALUE( CreatedDate )))
CustomField.label: Fecha de Creaci√≥n
